customer

Attribute Help / Comment Format Attributes
uid  Help
The globally unique identifier.
  		uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
name  Help
The display name.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		required
 
discountRate  Help
The discount rate applied to new orders for this customer. This rate is typically defaulted based on the customer's tier, but can be overridden for each customer. The rate defined here is used as the default for each new order associated with that customer.
  		double required

  		name
max length: 50

lockVersion  Help
This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.
  		lockVersion
